content: How can I incorporate sustainability into my Fluid Mechanics course?

For Fluid Mechanics courses, you can integrate sustainability by:

• **Energy Efficiency**: Discuss pump and turbine efficiency, renewable energy applications
• **Environmental Impact**: Cover water treatment, pollution control, and sustainable water management
• **Case Studies**: Include examples of sustainable fluid systems in buildings and infrastructure
• **Green Technologies**: Explore wind turbines, hydroelectric power, and sustainable HVAC systems
